info.name: LinusTechTip Forum
info.description:
LinusTechTip Forum theme replacement.
Works with forum day theme only, it breaks under the night theme, so be sure to switch to the day theme forum.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.2 - Further alignment and size of some button has been fixed
     - Thread pool layout fix
     - Right side column on main forum page section fix
     - Diverse improvements on the layout in user profile
     - Minor adjustments

v1.1 - Alignment fixed on some buttons
     - Marked as Answer post highlight fix
     - "Saving Post..." text is no longer on reverse
     - Minor adjustments

v1.0 - Initial release
